text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, a person may not provide mold remediation services unless the person is licensed by the Commission.

A licensee may not:
provide or offer to provide any mold remediation to a structure on which the firm or company or its employees has provided a mold assessment within the last 12 months; or
pay any compensation, inducement, or reward to a mold assessor or a mold assessor's firm in order to generate the referral of any business to the licensee's firm or company or its employees.
